title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4406.4 - Calculation of separate pools
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4406.4 - Calculation of separate pools

State Regulations

Determination of payoff to winning bettors shall be in
the form prescribed by the Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law. The
shared pool, or profit, shall be that amount resulting by the deduction of the
retained commission and involved breakage from the total pari-mutuel
pool. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4406.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
